reviewText: The reason I purchased this film was to learn about other religions and the viewpoints of those who practice this religion. This was a great flick for a child and it did increase my understanding.

My son is a Hanuman fan and I got this based on the original Hanuman DVD. This one is some sort of a meld of modern and traditional Hanuman. The story line is bizzare. My son did not like it at all after he watched it. I watched parts of it and thought it was very poorly done.
